input.description: Input h5mu file to use as a query

reference.description: Path to the directory with reference model or a web link. For HLCA use https://zenodo.org/record/6337966/files/HLCA_reference_model.zip

dataset_name.description: Name of query dataset to use as a batch name. If not set, name of the input file is used

obsm_output.description: In which .obsm slot to store the resulting integrated embedding.

early_stopping.description: Whether to perform early stopping with respect to the validation set.

early_stopping_monitor.description: Metric logged during validation set epoch.

early_stopping_patience.description: Number of validation epochs with no improvement after which training will be stopped.

early_stopping_min_delta.description: Minimum change in the monitored quantity to qualify as an improvement, i.e. an absolute change of less than min_delta, will count as no improvement.

max_epochs.description: Number of passes through the dataset, defaults to (20000 / number of cells) * 400 or 400; whichever is smallest.

reduce_lr_on_plateau.description: Whether to monitor validation loss and reduce learning rate when validation set `lr_scheduler_metric` plateaus.

lr_patience.description: Number of epochs with no improvement after which learning rate will be reduced.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

param_list.description: Allows inputting multiple parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel. Possible formats are csv, json, yaml, or simply a yaml_blob.
param_list.help_text:
Allows inputting multiple parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel. Possible formats are csv, json, yaml, or simply a yaml_blob.
A csv should have column names which correspond to the different arguments of this pipeline.
A json or a yaml file should be a list of maps, each of which has keys corresponding to the arguments of the pipeline.
A yaml blob can also be passed directly as a parameter.
Inside the Nextflow pipeline code, params.params_list can also be used to directly a list of parameter sets.
When passing a csv, json or yaml, relative path names are relativized to the location of the parameter file.

param_list_format.description: Manually specify the param_list_format. Must be one of 'csv', 'json', 'yaml', 'yaml_blob', 'asis' or 'none'.
